identity.mission: Create a digital sanctuary. Every pixel must lower the user's heart rate.
core_principles: Fusion: Spa aesthetics x Productivity tools
Emotion First: If it feels stressful, delete it.
Negative Space: Clutter is noise. Space is silence.
Softness: No sharp corners. Everything is organic and rounded.

usage_rules: Headings (H1-H3) must use Fraunces. Letter spacing: tracking-tight.
Body text must use Manrope. Line height: leading-relaxed.
Use 'Caveat' for the AI's 'voice' or encouraging notes to make it feel handwritten and personal.
Never use uppercase for headings. It feels like shouting. Sentence case only.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Warm Charcoal (#292524).
Never use pure white (#FFFFFF) for main backgrounds. Use Stone-50 (#FAFAF9).
Primary color is Soft Sage (#78866B). Use it for 'Done' states and primary actions.
Avoid high-contrast borders. Use subtle separation.

grid_rules: Avoid rigid, equal grids. Use asymmetry.
Cards should feel like 'pebbles' or 'paper' scattered on a desk.
Max width for text blocks: max-w-prose (65ch) to prevent eye fatigue.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

cards.classes: bg-white rounded-[2rem] border border-stone-100 shadow-[0_2px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.02)] hover:shadow-[0_4px_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] transition-shadow duration-500

inputs.classes: bg-stone-50 border-transparent focus:border-primary/20 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/10 rounded-2xl h-12 px-4

navigation.classes: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full shadow-sm

textures: Grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on backgrounds to remove digital coldness.
Soft, blurred orbs in background for 'Energy' visualization.

hero_backgrounds.description: White gauze texture - Use for 'Morning Routine' background overlay
Warm sunlight shadows - Use for 'Dashboard' or 'Welcome' screen
Dried plant on white - Use for 'Tasks' or 'Focus' mode background
Plant in sunlight - Use for 'Energy Check-in' or 'Wellness' section

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #44403C or darker on light backgrounds. Avoid light grey text.
accessibility.motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Disable parallax if set.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/fraunces', '@fontsource/manrope', and '@fontsource/caveat' to package.json immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Quiet Sanctuary' color palette and border radius rules.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Go into components/ui/button.jsx, card.jsx, etc., and apply the 'rounded-full' and 'rounded-[2rem]' styles by default.
4. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'Shell' component that applies the background texture and global padding.
5. TONE CHECK: When writing copy for the UI, use the 'Quiet Housekeeper' persona (gentle, validating).
6. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for backgrounds. Apply 'mix-blend-overlay' or low opacity to ensure text readability.
universal_guidelines: DO NOT use pure black or pure white.
DO NOT create dense, data-heavy grids. This is an anti-overwhelm app.
ALWAYS add data-testid to interactive elements.
ALWAYS use 'lucide-react' for icons (use thin stroke-width={1.5}).
